summary: Simple mod that change lockpicks weight to 0.1
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]

There is an existing mod that add weight to lockpicks, but it give a 0.05 value while in game 0.1 is displayed.
This mod give a 0.1 weight to lockpicks so you can have displayed the corrispetive value also ingame.


[color=yellow][b]Compatibilty:[/b][/color]

It's compatible with everything unless other mods change lockpicks weight value.


[color=yellow][b]Changes:[/b][/color]

-Lockpick weight increase to 0.1 (up from 0).


[color=yellow][b]My other mods:[/b][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3271584/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check all of them here[/url]
author: NedEllis
